'''1.12.60''' is a minor update to {{el|ee}}, released on January 31, 2020,<ref>{{link|url=https://minecrafteducation.zendesk.com/hc/articles/360035255232|title=What's New: The Library Release (Version 1.12.60)|author=Kyle M|website=''Minecraft: Education Edition Support''|date=January 31, 2020}}</ref> which fixes some bugs.

== Additions ==
* Enables iPadOS users to import worlds and templates.
* Let users logged in via <code>Single-Sign On (SSO)</code>, to bypass the "Sign-In or Try a Demo screen" screen for time saving.
